body: A hedge witch can channel stored spell energy into healing spells that she did not prepare ahead of time. The witch can “lose” any prepared spell that is not an orison in order to cast any cure spell of the same spell level or lower, even if she doesn't know that cure spell. This replaces the witch's hex gained at 4th level.
name: Spontaneous Healing
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Archetypes/Hedge Witch/Spontaneous Healing
